Package org.ivoa.dm.stc.coords

package org.ivoa.dm.stc.coords
  • Class
    Description
    AstroCoordSystem
    The AstroCoordSystem object holds a collection of component coordinate system descriptions across all represented physical domains.
    AstroCoordSystem.AstroCoordSystemBuilder
    A builder class for AstroCoordSystem, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    Axis
    The abstract parent class for all coordinate axis types.
    BinnedAxis
    Axis description for binned data, where values along the axis correspond to a bin number.
    BinnedAxis.BinnedAxisBuilder
    A builder class for BinnedAxis, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    BinnedCoordinate
    Coordinate value type specifically intended for binned data (e.g.: pixel indexes).
    BinnedCoordinate.BinnedCoordinateBuilder
    A builder class for BinnedCoordinate, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    CartesianCoordSpace
    Spatial domain, three-dimensional cartesian coordinate space.
    CartesianCoordSpace.CartesianCoordSpaceBuilder
    A builder class for CartesianCoordSpace, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    CartesianPoint
    A spatial coordinate in a Cartesian coordinate space.
    CartesianPoint.CartesianPointBuilder
    A builder class for CartesianPoint, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    ContinuousAxis
    Axis description for continuous data.
    ContinuousAxis.ContinuousAxisBuilder
    A builder class for ContinuousAxis, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    CoordFrame
    This is the abstract, empty, base class for all coordinate frames.
    Coordinate
    Abstract base class for the Coordinate data types which represent an absolute location within a coordinate space.
    CoordsModel
     
    CoordsModel.References
     
    CoordSpace
    This object defines a domain space.
    CoordSys
    Abstract head of the coordinate system object tree.
    CustomRefLocation
    A custom reference location in phase space (position and velocity).
    CustomRefLocation.CustomRefLocationBuilder
    A builder class for CustomRefLocation, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    DiscreteSetAxis
    Axis type specifically intended for enumerated coordinates.
    DiscreteSetAxis.DiscreteSetAxisBuilder
    A builder class for DiscreteSetAxis, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    Epoch
    We define epoch as a primitive data type with the expected form '{type}{year}' where type = 'J' or 'B' for Julian or Besselian respectively, and year is expressed as a decimal year.
    GenericCoordSpace
    Generic, one-dimensional coordinate space suitable for use with most non-spatial properties.
    GenericCoordSpace.GenericCoordSpaceBuilder
    A builder class for GenericCoordSpace, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    GenericFrame
    The generic coordinate frame is for cases where a domain-specific frame (e.g.: Space, Time), is not required, but the relevant reference metadata is still needed (e.g.: for Redshift or Spectral data).
    GenericFrame.GenericFrameBuilder
    A builder class for GenericFrame, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    GenericPoint
    GenericPoint supports the representation of spatial coordinates in a custom coordinate space, or any space which is not covered by the other specializations.
    GenericPoint.GenericPointBuilder
    A builder class for GenericPoint, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    GenericSys
    Specialized coordinate system for generic, one-dimensional domains not covered by other, more concrete objects.
    GenericSys.GenericSysBuilder
    A builder class for GenericSys, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    Handedness
    The handedness of a coordinate space.
    ISOTime
    Extension of TimeInstant for time expressed as a structured datetime string.
    ISOTime.ISOTimeBuilder
    A builder class for ISOTime, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    JD
    Extension of TimeInstant for time expressed in Julian days.
    JD.JDBuilder
    A builder class for JD, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    LonLatPoint
    A spatial coordinate in a Spherical coordinate space defining a Celestial position in Latitude and Longitude.
    LonLatPoint.LonLatPointBuilder
    A builder class for LonLatPoint, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    MJD
    Extension of TimeInstant for time expressed in Modified Julian Days.
    MJD.MJDBuilder
    A builder class for MJD, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    PhysicalCoordinate
    The most common type of coordinate value.
    PhysicalCoordinate.PhysicalCoordinateBuilder
    A builder class for PhysicalCoordinate, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    PhysicalCoordSpace
    Abstract head of coordinate spaces related to physical properties.
    PhysicalCoordSys
    Coordinate system description for any physical domain, such as Time, Space, Redshift, Temperature, Flux, etc.
    PixelCoordSystem
    The PixelCoordSystem provides a complete description of the pixel coordinate space.
    PixelCoordSystem.PixelCoordSystemBuilder
    A builder class for PixelCoordSystem, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    PixelIndex
    Specialized BinnedCoordinate for the pixel domain for a 1-dimensional pixel index.
    PixelIndex.PixelIndexBuilder
    A builder class for PixelIndex, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    PixelSpace
    A PixelSpace SHALL include one or more BinnedAxis objects describing the pixel coordinate space.
    PixelSpace.PixelSpaceBuilder
    A builder class for PixelSpace, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    Point
    Multi-dimensional spatial coordinate.
    PolCoordinate
    Abstract head of the polarization coordinate types.
    PolState
    Coordinate type for discrete polarization states.
    PolState.PolStateBuilder
    A builder class for PolState, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    PolStateEnum
    Polarization states: Stokes, Circular, Linear and Vector states .
    RefLocation
    RefLocation defines the origin of the spatial coordinate space.
    SpaceFrame
    A SpaceFrame is specified by its reference frame (orientation), and a reference position (origin).
    SpaceFrame.SpaceFrameBuilder
    A builder class for SpaceFrame, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    SpaceSys
    Specialized coordinate system for the Spatial domain.
    SpaceSys.SpaceSysBuilder
    A builder class for SpaceSys, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    SphericalCoordSpace
    Spatial domain, three-dimensional spherical coordinate space.
    SphericalCoordSpace.SphericalCoordSpaceBuilder
    A builder class for SphericalCoordSpace, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    StdRefLocation
    An absolute a-priori known location in phase space (position and velocity).
    StdRefLocation.StdRefLocationBuilder
    A builder class for StdRefLocation, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    TimeFrame
    A TimeFrame SHALL include a time scale and reference position.
    TimeFrame.TimeFrameBuilder
    A builder class for TimeFrame, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    TimeInstant
    TimeStamps which specify a specific instant in time.
    TimeOffset
    Time is given as an offset from a specific point in time (time0).
    TimeOffset.TimeOffsetBuilder
    A builder class for TimeOffset, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    TimeStamp
    This is the abstract basis for a set of simple time domain coordinates which are expected to accommodate the vast majority of use cases.
    TimeSys
    Specialized coordinate system for the Temporal domain.
    TimeSys.TimeSysBuilder
    A builder class for TimeSys, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
